entry.title: Mingyu Woo
entry.summary:

  • Received B.Sc. Summa Cum-Laude in Electrical and Computer Engineering from UNIST (Mar. 2011 - Feb. 2017)

entry.content:
Profile

  • M.S. in System on Chip Design Lab, SoCDL (Mar. 2017 - Present)
  • Visiting Scholarship in ABK Group, Computer Science, University of California San Diego (Jan. 2017 - Mar. 2017)
  • Received B.Sc. Summa Cum-Laude in Electrical and Computer Engineering from UNIST (Mar. 2011 - Feb. 2017)
  • Computer Technicaian Soldier in Republic of Korea Air Force (May. 2012 - May. 2014)

Interest

Current

Circuit Physical Design, Design Automation, Machine learning

Old

Computer Security, Web Programming

Publication

Conference

* M. Woo, S. Kim and S. Kang, "GRASP based Metaheuristics for Layout Pattern Classification", Proc. IEEE/ACM International Conference on Computer-Aided Design, 2017. (to appear)

Campus Activies

Co-founder, HeXA (a computer research group) @ UNIST (2012.03 ~ 2016.02)

Lead and improve the club as a national competitive computer club.

Personal Projects

Web programming

+ [Meal planner](http://bab.hexa.pro) for UNIST
+ [Bus arrivial info](http://bus.hexa.pro) for UNIST

Award

Hackerthon

2nd and choice prize award at HeXAthon, Ulsan, 2016.

Scholarship

  • Academic Performance Scholarship, UNIST (Mar. 2017 - present)
  • National Graduate Science & Technology Scholarship (Mar. 2011 - Feb. 2017)

Activies

  • Teaching Assistant of Engineering Programming 1 (C++) (2015 - 2017)
  • Tutor of Engineering Programming 1 (C++) (2014 - 2015)

Skills

Programming: Python, C++, C, PHP, Java, Javascript.

Human Languages: English - Professional working proficiency, Korean - Native
